evidence.claim: Company utilizes AWS for serverless architecture and data storage.
Integrates FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
X12 EDI transactions are supported for billing and claims processing.
HIPAA compliance is featured in their security page, ensuring safe health data exchange.
Event-driven architecture is described on their engineering blog detailing data processing techniques.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 for HIPAA-compliant data exchange, aligning with API-first healthcare integration.
